summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms
Review Date: 2014/12/22
Store: ASP
Product Description: ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.']
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'}
Review Text: OK - but none of the forms are large enough for me to use on my thumb.  Had to order a different type.  Also, doesn't have any lines on it to measure your nail bed but after adding my own "line" I can use it multiple times.
Review Title: OK - but none of the forms are large enough ...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin by WONDERPIEL for Men and Women - 100% Natural 70% Organic
Review Date: 2016/06/27
Store: ATOPAL
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ATOPAL', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 1.5 x 1.3 inches; 4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This product so far seems to work. My face is much smoother and moisturized. The reason for the 3 stars is due to the smell of the product. The fragrance is so strong that I'm not sure I can continue to use it as I have a sensitive nose and strong smells bother me. Not sure what the smell is.... smells like "old woman" to me.
Review Title: Seems to work but very strong smell...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Danbihuabi 4pcs Silver Rhinestone Flower Pearl Wedding Brooches Pins Set
Review Date: 2016/11/17
Store: Danbihuabi
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Ab001-004A'}
Review Text: Awesome looking brooches. They do tend to catch on the scarf if it is knitted. As long as you keep this in mind, they are great!
Review Title: Awesome looking brooches
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Charcoal Detoxifying and Cleansing Facial Wipes - 30 PC (Pack of 2)
Review Date: 2020/05/15
Store: Greenbrier
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Greenbrier', 'Unit Count': '60.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing,Detoxifying,Dirt,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.81 x 5.16 x 3.54 inches; 12.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: I used this to clean my face. Seems to work just fine. I also used it to clean off my dog's tears spots on her face. Seems to really help with cleaning up that yeast in the eye area of my dog.  Smells like baby or makeup wipes. The sheets themselves are black colored.
Review Title: Seems to do what it claims.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consumer with a preference for personal care and beauty products, reflecting a blend of practical and aesthetic considerations. Ratings indicate a moderate level of satisfaction, often highlighting issues with sizing or fragrance sensitivity, showcasing a discerning taste regarding product usability and scent. 

The individual favors products that serve specific functions like nail application, skin hydration, and makeup removal. The purchase of reusable forms suggests a focus on sustainability, while the charcoal wipes and face moisturizer reflect concerns about skin health and maintenance. Notable themes include a tendency to seek effective solutions, though the consumer is sensitive to overpowering scents, which impacts their overall satisfaction.

Quality appears to be prioritized over price, but there is an evident sensitivity to strong fragrances, hinting at the need for products that are effective yet gentle. A consistent pattern of seeking reusable or multi-functional items demonstrates an inclination toward practical, versatile solutions. Overall, this consumer values aesthetics and functionality while maintaining a critical eye on product quality and sensory characteristics.

target_interaction.title: These are amazing!
target_interaction.text:
These are amazing! They look real, too. There is a bit of a learning curve but what is nice is that the "eyebrow" pattern is also printed on the backside of the paper. This makes it much easier line it into place correctly. I had to remove one because I put it on in a wrong angle. They look real and once the water dries, is not too shiny.

One thing to note, is that if you have hairs this will probably not work as the hairs seem to not let the eyebrow stick properly. If you have almost no brows, then this will be amazing.

These tattoos are like the kids tattoos that you wet and stick. My 2nd try went much better.
1. cut the eyebrows as close to the shape as you can to avoid a raised outline
2. remove the plastic protection from the tattoo
3. place it exactly where you would like to lay it down - tattoo side towards clean, dry skin
4. place a saturated a washcloth against the paper back of the tattoo and hold it there for about 30 seconds, making sure to keep the tattoo pressed to your skin
5. once the tattoo paper backing is completely saturated, remove the tattoo starting from the widest side to the narrowest (start from the nose side first)
6. if the tattoo doesn't look like it's sticking, place back down and hold the washcloth on it again, pressing down on the paper with your fingers
7. remove
target_interaction.title_meta: DAGEDA 4D Eyebrow Transfers Stickers, Brown 90 Pairs 9 Styles 9 PC Long Lasting Natural Waterproof Bionic Eyebrow Water Transfer Tattoo Eyebrow Sticker For Woman Man Makeup Tool
